constraint.name: Capsules are always active classifiers

constraints.constraint: Capsules are always active classifiersbase_Class.isActive

constraint.name: A capsule cannot have Reception features

constraints.constraint: A capsule cannot have Reception features base_Class.ownedReception->isEmpty()

constraint.name: A capsule class can always be subclassed

constraints.constraint: A capsules class can always be subclassednot(base_Class.isFinalSpecialization)

constraint.name: A capsule can have at most one superclass

constraints.constraint: A capsule can have at most one superclass(base_Class.generalization->size()) <= 1

constraint.name: Capsule classes are always substitutable

constraints.constraint: Capsule classes are always substitutable(base_Class.generalization->notEmpty()) implies (base_Class.generalization->forAll (g | g.isSubstitutable))

constraint.name: All attributes of a capsule class can have at most one type

constraints.constraint: All atributes of a capsule class must have at most one typebase_Class.ownedAttribute->forAll(at | at.type->size() = 1)

constraint.name: A capsule class cannot have nested classifiers

constraints.constraint: A capsule class cannot have nested classifiersbase_Class.nestedClassifier->isEmpty()

constraint.name: All operations of a capsule are guarded

constraints.constraint: All operations of a capsule are guardedbase_Class.ownedOperation->notEmpty() implies (base_Class.ownedOperation->forAll(op | op.concurrency = UML::CallConcurrencyKind::guarded))

constraint.name: Protocols can have at most one generalization

constraints.constraint: Protocols can have at most one generalizationbase_Collaboration.generalization->size() <= 1

constraint.name: A wired port cannot publish its name

constraints.constraint: A wired port cannot publish its nameisWired implies not isPublish

constraint.name: A public port must be defined as a service port

constraints.constraint: A public port must be defined as a service port(base_Port.visibility = UML::VisibilityKind::public) implies base_Port.isService

constraint.name: A SAP (unwired & unpublished) must have protected visibility

constraints.constraint: A SAP (unwired & unpublished) must have protected visibility (not isWired and not isPublish) implies (base_Port.visibility = UML::VisibilityKind::protected)

constraint.name: An SPP (unwired and published) must have public visibility

constraints.constraint: An SPP (unwired and published) must have public visibility(not isWired and isPublish) implies (base_Port.visibility = UML::VisibilityKind::public)

constraint.name: Only binary connectors are allowed

constraints.constraint: Only binary connectors allowedbase_Connector.end->size() = 2

constraint.name: Exclusion can only be applied to some UML-RT model elements

constraints.constraint: Exclusion can only be applied to some UML-RT model elementslet el = base_RedefinableElement in (el.oclIsKindOf(UML::Port) or el.oclIsKindOf(UML::Property) or el.oclIsKindOf(UML::Operation) or el.oclIsKindOf(UML::Behavior) or el.oclIsKindOf(UML::Region) or el.oclIsKindOf(UML::State) or el.oclIsKindOf(UML::StateMachine) or el.oclIsKindOf(UML::Transition))

constraint.name: An RT state machine has exactly one region

constraints.constraint: An RT state machine has exactly one regionbase_StateMachine.region->size() = 1

constraint.name: An RT state machine is never re-entrant

constraints.constraint: An RT state machine is never re-entrantnot base_StateMachine.isReentrant

constraint.name: RT state machines do not have parameters or parameter sets

constraints.constraint: RT state machines do not have parameters or parameter sets(base_StateMachine.ownedParameter->size()=0) and (base_StateMachine.ownedParameterSet->size() = 0)

constraint.name: RT state machines must have a context and it must be a Class

constraints.constraint: RT state machines must have a context and it must be a Class(base_StateMachine.context->size()=1) and (base_StateMachine.context.oclIsKindOf(Class))

constraint.name: Passive state machine are only allowed on passive data classes

constraints.constraint: Passive state machine are only allowed on passive data classesisPassive = not (base_StateMachine.context.oclAsType(Class).isActive)

constraint.name: Passive state machines must not be reentrant

constraints.constraint: Passive state machines must not be reentrantisPassive implies not (base_StateMachine.isReentrant)

constraint.name: A composte RT state has exactly one region

constraints.constraint: A composte RT state has exactly one regionbase_State.isComposite implies (base_State.region->size() = 1)

constraint.name: RT does not support submachine states

constraints.constraint: RT does not support submachine statesnot base_State.isSubmachineState

constraint.name: RT state machines do not support "do" activities

constraints.constraint: RT state machines do not support "do" activitiesbase_State.doActivity->size() = 0

constraint.name: RT state machines cannot have any deferred triggers

constraints.constraint: RT state machines cannot have any deferred triggers base_State.deferrableTrigger->size() = 0

constraint.name: RT state machines do not support concurrency or shallow history

constraints.constraint: RT state machines do not support concurrency or shallow historylet knd = base_Pseudostate.kind in (knd <> UML::PseudostateKind::shallowHistory) and (knd <> UML::PseudostateKind::fork) and (knd <> UML::PseudostateKind::join)
